languages.text: {n}С отточенным спокойствием Паскаль проверяет готовность к битве своего оружия. Голос его исполнен холодного презрения:{/n} "Киберкузнец боится мусорного кода, что может испортить его труд. Но я — не киберкузнец. Лорд кузницы боится скверны, что поразит подвластные ему станки и исказит продукцию его цеха. Но я — не лорд кузницы".

{n}With practised calm, Pasqal checks if his weapon is ready for battle. His voice is filled with cold contempt:{/n} "A Cybersmith fears the scrap-code that might ruin their work. But I am no Cybersmith. A Forge Lord fears the corruption that might afflict the lathes in their charge and deform the product of their workshop. But I am no Forge Lord."
languages.original_text: {n}С отточенным спокойствием Паскаль проверяет готовность к битве своего оружия. Голос его исполнен холодного презрения:{/n} "Киберкузнец боится мусорного кода, что может испортить его труд. Но я — не киберкузнец. Лорд кузницы боится скверны, что поразит подвластные ему станки и исказит продукцию его цеха. Но я — не лорд кузницы".

But I am no Cybersmith. A Forge Lord fears the corruption that might afflict the lathes in their charge and deform the product of their workshop. But I am no Forge Lord."

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡带着千锤百炼的冷静态度，检查着他的武器是否可以进行战斗。他的声音中充满了冷漠的蔑视。{/n}“智控锻造师可能会惧怕那些废码，因为废码可能会毁了他们的工作成果，但我并不是智控锻造师。铸造领主可能会惧怕腐化，因为腐化可能会影响他们负责的机床，导致产品变形，但我并不是铸造领主。”
languages.original_text: {n}With practised calm, Pasqal checks if his weapon is ready for battle. His voice is filled with cold contempt:{/n} "A Cybersmith fears the scrap-code that might ruin their work. But I am no Cybersmith. A Forge Lord fears the corruption that might afflict the lathes in their charge and deform the product of their workshop. But I am no Forge Lord."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡带着千锤百炼的冷静态度，检查着他的武器是否可以进行战斗。他的声音中充满了冷漠的蔑视。{/n}“智控锻造师可能会惧怕那些废码，因为废码可能会毁了他们的工作成果，但我并不是智控锻造师。铸造领主可能会惧怕腐化，因为腐化可能会影响他们负责的机床，导致产品变形，但我并不是铸造领主。”

languages.text: {n}Con la tranquilidad que da la práctica, Pasqal comprueba que su arma esté lista. Su voz es fría y desdeñosa:{/n} «Un ciberherrero teme el código de chatarra que puede arruinar su trabajo. Pero no soy ciberherrero. Un Señor de la Forja teme a la corrupción que puede aquejar los tornos a su cargo y deformar los productos de su taller. Pero no soy Señor de la Forja».
languages.original_text: {n}With practised calm, Pasqal checks if his weapon is ready for battle. His voice is filled with cold contempt:{/n} "A Cybersmith fears the scrap-code that might ruin their work. But I am no Cybersmith. A Forge Lord fears the corruption that might afflict the lathes in their charge and deform the product of their workshop. But I am no Forge Lord."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con la tranquilidad que da la práctica, Pasqal comprueba que su arma esté lista. Su voz es fría y desdeñosa:{/n} «Un ciberherrero teme el código de chatarra que puede arruinar su trabajo. Pero no soy ciberherrero. Un Señor de la Forja teme a la corrupción que puede aquejar los tornos a su cargo y deformar los productos de su taller. Pero no soy Señor de la Forja».

languages.text: {n}パスカルは訓練された冷静さで、自分の武器が戦える状態か確認した。彼の声は冷たい軽蔑に満ちている。{/n}「人脳鍛冶師は、仕事を台無しにしかねない破壊コードを恐れています。しかし、自分は人脳鍛冶師ではありません。工業監督者は担当する旋盤を苦しめ、作業場の製品を歪ませかねない腐敗を恐れています。しかし、自分は工業監督者ではありません」
languages.original_text: {n}With practised calm, Pasqal checks if his weapon is ready for battle. His voice is filled with cold contempt:{/n} "A Cybersmith fears the scrap-code that might ruin their work. But I am no Cybersmith. A Forge Lord fears the corruption that might afflict the lathes in their charge and deform the product of their workshop. But I am no Forge Lord."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは訓練された冷静さで、自分の武器が戦える状態か確認した。彼の声は冷たい軽蔑に満ちている。{/n}「人脳鍛冶師は、仕事を台無しにしかねない破壊コードを恐れています。しかし、自分は人脳鍛冶師ではありません。工業監督者は担当する旋盤を苦しめ、作業場の製品を歪ませかねない腐敗を恐れています。しかし、自分は工業監督者ではありません」

languages.text: {n}Mit erprobter Ruhe überprüft Pasqal, ob seine Waffe kampfbereit ist. In seiner Stimme liegt kalte Verachtung:{/n} "Ein Cyberschmied fürchtet den Schadcode, der seine Arbeit ruinieren könnte. Aber ich bin kein Cyberschmied. Ein Fabrikmeister fürchtet die Korruption, die seine Drehbänke befallen und das Produkt seiner Werkstatt deformieren könnte. Aber ich bin kein Fabrikmeister."
languages.original_text: {n}With practised calm, Pasqal checks if his weapon is ready for battle. His voice is filled with cold contempt:{/n} "A Cybersmith fears the scrap-code that might ruin their work. But I am no Cybersmith. A Forge Lord fears the corruption that might afflict the lathes in their charge and deform the product of their workshop. But I am no Forge Lord."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit erprobter Ruhe überprüft Pasqal, ob seine Waffe kampfbereit ist. In seiner Stimme liegt kalte Verachtung:{/n} "Ein Cyberschmied fürchtet den Schadcode, der seine Arbeit ruinieren könnte. Aber ich bin kein Cyberschmied. Ein Fabrikmeister fürchtet die Korruption, die seine Drehbänke befallen und das Produkt seiner Werkstatt deformieren könnte. Aber ich bin kein Fabrikmeister."

languages.text: {n}Avec un calme assuré, Pasqal s'assure que son arme est prête au combat, puis lance avec un mépris glacial :{/n} « Un cybermancien craint l'anticode qui pourrait ruiner son travail. Mais je ne suis pas cybermancien. Un seigneur de forge craint la corruption qui pourrait affecter les fourneaux dont il a la charge et altérer la production de son atelier. Mais je ne suis pas un seigneur de forge. »
languages.original_text: {n}With practised calm, Pasqal checks if his weapon is ready for battle. His voice is filled with cold contempt:{/n} "A Cybersmith fears the scrap-code that might ruin their work. But I am no Cybersmith. A Forge Lord fears the corruption that might afflict the lathes in their charge and deform the product of their workshop. But I am no Forge Lord."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un calme assuré, Pasqal s'assure que son arme est prête au combat, puis lance avec un mépris glacial :{/n} « Un cybermancien craint l'anticode qui pourrait ruiner son travail. Mais je ne suis pas cybermancien. Un seigneur de forge craint la corruption qui pourrait affecter les fourneaux dont il a la charge et altérer la production de son atelier. Mais je ne suis pas un seigneur de forge. »

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, sakin bir şekilde silahının emniyetini kontrol ediyor. Sesi, soğuk bir küçümsemeyle dolu.{/n} "Bir Siberkuran, çalışmalarını mahvedebilecek hurda kodundan korkabilir. Ben Siberkuran değilim. Bir Dökümhane Lordu, tezgâhlarına zarar verip atölyelerinin ürününü deforme edebilecek yozlaşmadan korkar. Ben Dökümhane Lordu da değilim."
languages.original_text: {n}With practised calm, Pasqal checks if his weapon is ready for battle. His voice is filled with cold contempt:{/n} "A Cybersmith fears the scrap-code that might ruin their work. But I am no Cybersmith. A Forge Lord fears the corruption that might afflict the lathes in their charge and deform the product of their workshop. But I am no Forge Lord."

Sesi, soğuk bir küçümsemeyle dolu.{/n} "Bir Siberkuran, çalışmalarını mahvedebilecek hurda kodundan korkabilir ama ben Siberkuran değilim. Bir Dökümhane Lordu, tezgâhlarına zarar verip atölyelerinin ürününü deforme edebilecek yozlaşmadan korkar ama ben Dökümhane Lordu da değilim."
